law.catch_line: Length of bouts, exhibitions, and rounds.

text.section: A boxing or kickboxing bout or exhibition shall not consist of more than twelve (12) rounds.
A mixed martial arts bout or exhibition shall not consist of more than five (5) rounds.
Duration of the rounds shall be determined by administrative regulation.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 17.
